item.title: Car parked on pavement, 26th September
item.description:
Car parked on pavement almost every day between 12(noon) and 11pm. Also drives car on the pavement (where children walk) and has burble tune on the exhaust, which means the car is very loud when driving and parking on pavement.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brownswood Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Graffiti, 26th September

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 200, Benhill Road, Camberwell, London

item.title: Flag obscuring 'No Right Turn' sign, 26th September
item.description:
One of those 'safely installed' flags has managed to obscure critical road signage on busy thoroughfare in area of complex traffic lights and one ways systems Quite a few others are now hanging by a thread and looking very sad. Assuming the 'patriots' haven't got a schedule of maintenance in place are we expected to watch our national flag droop, sag, fade, tear and disintegrate over the winter months? Remove this traffic hazard.. and take down the rest while your at it. This lack of pride in our glorious flag is getting embarrassing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Bellegrove Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 128, Ridgeway West, Falconwood, London

item.title: Car transport and its cars blocking bus stop W - 10:30 today, 26th September
item.description:
